El Alamein Cemetery- It was here that 200,000 Allied soldiers under the command of Bernard Montgomery finally defeated Erwin Rommel â€“ known as the Desert Fox. This battle which cost many lives on both sides.

Grand Egyptian Museum - The new crown jewel of Egypt, and one of the world's largest, most exciting museums. It will host about 100,000 ancient artifacts, 4,549 of which will be from the tomb of the famous King Tutankhamun.â€
